name: Lemon Drop
description: Created in San Francisco in the '70s, the Lemon Drop is a deliciously boozy yet tart concoction which is easy to make.
steps: Coat the rim of a martini glass with sugar and let dry.
Shake vodka, triple sec, lemon juice, and simple syrup in cocktail shaker with ice until well chilled.
footnote: As a bonus, garnish with a slice of lemon on the rim.
